column1: 20% of Ohio hospitals are reporting staffing shortages due to overwhelming numbers of COVID-19 patients. PLEASE do you part and take the necessary precautions to stay safe. https://t.co/hjrnPo0EdK

Let’s take a moment together to mourn the quarter of a million Americans who have been taken by this virus. As we reflect on this tragedy my deepest hope is that we can come together to prevent further devastation from COVID-19. https://t.co/GxrvrRAvLJ
It’s urgent we pass a COVID package for the American people. President-elect Biden agrees. President Trump agrees. When will @senatemajldr get with the program? https://t.co/xMR9wxTatF
1 in every 315 people in Ohio tested positive for #COVID19 in the past week.  I implore you: take precautions to #StopTheSpread. You will save lives by doing the right thing.
No matter your health coverage EVERY American should have access to COVID testing. ⬇️ https://t.co/wQ8Jl9TiBG
If you are sick with #COVID19 you may qualify for paid sick and/or family leave.  Learn more and #KnowYourRights by visiting https://t.co/EV3nrIz5KV

The motorcoach industry has been deeply stricken by this pandemic. It's critical we help those left behind who are in urgent need of assistance so I pressed @SpeakerPelosi to provide $10B in emergency relief funding in the COVID relief package that's currently being negotiated👇 https://t.co/DFHh7qliye

The investment we make in COVID relief will directly determine the strength and speed of our recovery. The #HeroesAct has been sitting on @senatemajldr’s desk since May. Why won’t he step up and get the American people the help they need?
The Senate should be passing a COVID relief package right now but instead they are pulling out all the stops to confirm a judge who'll vote to take away our health care.

Nearly 16 million Americans work in the restaurant industry. If the Senate continues to stall on a comprehensive COVID relief package the restaurant industry faces detrimental losses and many of those millions of Americans could be out of work long-term.

“Skinny” COVID relief is not relief. It’s a desperate attempt to seem like the Senate is doing something to help the American people when in reality @senatemajldr has been “hitting pause” since May. https://t.co/e4GlIg8Xek
Most Ohioans have been doing everything they can to keep our state safe. We must now keep them safe and supported by passing a comprehensive COVID relief package that meets the moment. #HeroesAct
Got the sniffles? Here’s a quick explainer on how to tell if it’s the flu or if it could be COVID. https://t.co/n8uRqL9dNU
Now more than ever we need empathy. This year’s #WorldMentalHealthDay comes as families in America and across the world are adjusting to this new COVID reality.
Small bars & restaurants are barely making it as it is. Now the President has refused to pass additional COVID relief. That’s only hurting folks like this ⬇️  https://t.co/I6ioFdskRo

The coronavirus crisis is a housing crisis.  I’m proud to support @HouseDemocrats’ updated #HeroesAct to help struggling families afford a safe place to live with tens of billions in new supports to assist renters and homeowners.

Good news! A lot of people have reached out today asking if I had taken a #COVID test since I attended the debate in Cleveland and I wanted to let you all know I did take one this morning and the results just came back NEGATIVE. Thank you all for the well wishes.

Our local restaurants are among the hardest hit from this crisis. I’m fighting to ensure the next #COVID package provides relief for local restaurants that have been a staple in our community. https://t.co/FzR8lzWjxj

Too many students are at risk. In the next round of #COVID funding we must ensure schools have the resources they need to make sure kids from all backgrounds can keep up with their education during these difficult times. https://t.co/Cdfrz7XZgY
Too many of our local spots are struggling due to no fault of their own. Our next #COVID package must include help for them to make it through this pandemic. #SaveOurStages  https://t.co/D40ryBD96q

The latest word is that we may introduce another #COVID package to help working people who need it most. I’m pushing hard to make sure it includes: ➡️Cash payments ➡️State and local funding ➡️Relief for our local restaurants who have been among the hardest hit in this pandemic.
Says a lot about Senate Republicans that they can drop everything to confirm a new #SCOTUS judge yet we have been waiting 130 days for them to act on a COVID relief bill.

It’s hard to wrap your head around the possibility of 410000 Americans losing their lives to this virus before the end of the year.   We must do everything within our power to keep that from happening. We need a comprehensive national COVID strategy.
201 days ago the President said we’d soon have zero COVID cases in the US.   We currently have 6.7 million cases and more than 198000 deaths.
Science isn’t political. The Administration’s political appointees shouldn’t be tampering with COVID data. https://t.co/4rNmzFv7nQ
No more nonsense about how @HouseDemocrats won't negotiate on a #COVID package. We've been ready to negotiate. https://t.co/qbDDSdz12U

🗣️ REMINDER 🗣️ we’ve seen a jump in #COVID cases after other long weekends this summer.   Let’s keep our wits about us this weekend: wear a mask keep your distance and wash your hands. #LaborDayWeekend https://t.co/p0d5qj59yE
The COVID death rate isn’t the only cause for concern. Long-term side effects from this disease are serious. Let’s keep taking precautions and #MaskUp. https://t.co/4wO9NCt5bw

➡️4.9M cases. ➡️160K dead. ➡️55M first-time unemployment claims. It’s simple: this president’s #FailuretoLead has left millions infected thousands dead & created the worst economic disaster since the Great Depression. #COVID19
Our seniors are among the most vulnerable to COVID-19. We should be doing everything we can to make sure they are protected and taken care of during this crisis. https://t.co/pbDbUSUvwZ

Mind boggling that there’s still no national plan to fight this virus… I’m starting to think the President is never going to make one.   What do you think: is the President going to implement a serious plan to combat COVID-19 in the US?

For six months now coronavirus has wreaked havoc on American workers. We need to get help out to these small business owners essential workers and those who have been economically displaced. ASAP. https://t.co/sWRmXBtZDU

With nearly 80% of states seeing an increase in #COVID19 cases we have to be thinking critically about how we’re going to decrease transmission. This is one key step in overcoming the spread of the virus. https://t.co/ZqrJqjpKjH

With over 70000 new #COVID-19 cases our nation’s hospitals and public health infrastructures are at their breaking point. States need relief. The Senate should act immediately and pass the #HEROESAct. https://t.co/9tpY8hUAR6
Asymptomatic cases are responsible for at least 50% of COVID-19 transmission. It’s critical we keep wearing our masks and taking precautions even if we feel well. https://t.co/864NwzIP3i

The Administration is so far removed from reality. We lead the world in COVID-19 cases & deaths. If anything other countries are looking to us as a cautionary tale of how NOT to handle this crisis. https://t.co/0dNo6CiGVF
Amateur hour is right. The US now makes up 25% of total coronavirus cases globally. This crisis has been completely mishandled and it’s a disgrace. https://t.co/GpR1Cfzhnr

1/ Have you considered yet that every American who has tested positive for #COVID19 now has a pre-existing condition?  Repealing health insurance for 23 million Americans is cruel and it would be catastrophic. https://t.co/Hj2igmD9Gc
Testing saves lives. It is that simple. President Trump’s effort to slow down coronavirus testing is a threat to Americans nationwide. https://t.co/SArcdKXmpD

It’s no joke. Trump wanted to slow down testing to artificially deflate the number of reported cases.   We have >2.4 million cases & nearly 123000 deaths from COVID-19. The need for a more robust testing infrastructure has never been so dire. https://t.co/nvePTPr202

Just because our president is no longer seriously addressing this crisis doesn’t mean it’s over. We need a comprehensive testing and mitigation strategy. We’ve lost 120000 American lives & we can’t pretend ignoring #COVID19 will make it go away. https://t.co/alz9C9FnP0
As states see a worrisome spike in COVID-19 cases this is a timely reminder that we should all be wearing our masks -- doing so could cut the spread in half. https://t.co/B96IwQAGxC

Disappointed to hear this Administration has politicized a non-political body like the CDC. Coronavirus will not discriminate by party. We have to listen to scientists and work together as a country to beat this virus and get Americans the help they need. https://t.co/IPQOaQN5Jt

I’m old enough to remember when the President said we’d soon have zero #COVID19 cases.  We now have nearly 1.5 million cases and nearly 87000 deaths - more deaths than any other country in the world. https://t.co/bclnaXavud

Looking forward to @MindfulOnline's event tomorrow to talk about adapting to the new normal in the time of #COVID19.  Sign up today submit your questions & join us tomorrow @ 4:30 EST for Mindful in Action: What Now? #mynewnormal https://t.co/URliMtOCiV

#COVID19 testing in Ohio to dramatically increase thanks to this company in Independence -- so proud Northeast Ohio is leading the way. https://t.co/Sm9ZyP6BZf

Some Americans have been more affected by the #COVID19 crisis than others but we can never forget that we are all in this together. https://t.co/eAouyP40m8 #AllAmericans #AllofUs https://t.co/ipYapGtOw4
